resources.string: Long press S-View screen to toggle playback
Select media player to control when skipping tracks
Disable metadata updates by the stock Samsung music player, this can solve problems like hidden metadata
Type in the amount of time you want to long press the screen to toggle playback (in milliseconds, 1s = 1000ms)
When ticked, swiping left/right will only change tracks while music is playing
The device will speak what this application is registering in terms of gestures
